All of this data is scraped from the Lothian Buses website.

Files contain the following fields:

  * Name of stop (sometimes truncated)
  * "Short code" of stop
  * Latitude & Longitude of stop location

Download in:
  * [http://bustrackr.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/data/stopdata.csv CSV]
  * [http://bustrackr.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/data/stopdata.sql SQL inserts]
  * [http://bustrackr.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/data/stopdata.kml KML]

[http://maps.google.co.uk/maps?q=http:%2F%2Fbustrackr.googlecode.com%2Fsvn%2Ftrunk%2Fdata%2Fstopdata.kml&ie=UTF8&hl=en&z=10 View KML on Google Maps]
